DESCRIPTION: #yHealthy effects trigger if you are above #b50% of your max health.
#yWounded  effects trigger if you are at or below #b50% of your max health.
Starts at the bottom of your draw pile.
When your deck is reshuffled, move to the bottom of the draw pile.
When your deck is reshuffled, move to the top of the draw pile.
Move an amount of cards from the top of your draw pile to your discard pile. Gain #yVoid for each card moved.
If this card would be #yMilled, add it to your hand instead of the discard pile.
Do the following effect once for each #yWill you have. Then, lose 1 #yWill.
Your ability to fight the influence of the artifact.
Fracture effects happen when you have #bX or more #yWill.
Creatures take more damage for each Doom they have.
Increase the damage and #yBlock of the next card you play this turn that attacks or #yBlocks.
